config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used in the code to set the number of photons for InstantGI. It retrieves the value from the Options object passed to the InstantGI constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration depends on when the InstantGI object is instantiated with the Options object containing the configuration values. It is triggered during the initialization of InstantGI.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration option is significant as it directly affects the number of photons used in InstantGI calculations. Changing this value can impact the quality and performance of the global illumination rendering in the system.
